description: JurisPro provides a free directory of expert witnesses in over 10,000 areas of expertise.

cases.title: Psychiatry Expert Witness Diagnosis of Schizophrenia Not Enough to Overcome Murder Verdict
cases.description: Defendant is guilty of murder despite Psychiatry Expert Witness diagnosis of his schizophrenic condition.

cases.title: Human Resource Expert Witness Not Qualified to Testify in Discrimination Case
cases.description: A Human Resources Expert Witness was not qualified to testify in a race discrimination case because he lacked expertise beyond that of a layperson.

cases.title: Psychology Expert Witness Testifies Defendant Was Not Able to Understand Miranda Rights
cases.description: A Psychology Expert Witness testified that because of the Defendant’s low IQ, he was not able to understand his Miranda Rights.

cases.title: Wound Care Expert Witness Required to Support Plaintiff’s Claims
cases.description: Plaintiff’s failure to name a Wound Care Expert Witness to support his claims lead to the court granting defendants’ motion for summary judgment.
